message:
0.0.6

- Add getOnScrollListener() so an OnScrollListener can be used instead of providing an AbsListView

title: Update README.md
message:
Update README.md

Add Play Store demo app link

0.0.5
- Allows to show/hide without animating
- Allows to provide a parent instead of just an id, useful when using within fragments
- Fixes corner case when view has no height yet, this happens if a hide/show call is made right after creating a new instance
- Fixes builder not returning its own instance for anim* methods

title: Fancier demo
message:
Fancier demo
Use proper group, better artifact id
Add modified mvn push gradle script for now

title: Fix an issue when switching between lists causing hide/show events after setting…
message: Fix an issue when switching between lists causing hide/show events after setting delegate as scroll listener

title: Stop using menu APIs as they are not intended for this use, a simple OnClickListener must do
message:
Stop using menu APIs as they are not intended for this use, a simple OnClickListener must do
